text: The scheme will be subject to Cabinet approval. Mr. Watkinson remains convinced that the policy initiated in 1957, in Mr. Sandys's time as Minister of Defence, is still correct. This was to return to the tradition of all-Regular voluntary forces, with the last National Serviceman out of uniform by the end of 1962.
handwritten_text: The scheme will be subject to Cabinet approval. Mr. Watkinson remains convinced that the policy initiated in 1957, in Mr. Sandys's time as Minister of Defence, is still correct. This was to return to the tradition of all-Regular voluntary forces, with the last National Serviceman out of uniform by the end of 1962.
